resource.name: CDA All Data
resource.description: The principal amounts, sale dates, interest rates, terms, purposes, ratings, costs of issuance, financing team participants, issuance documents, and annual reporting (if applicable), among 67 other data points required under California Government Code section 8855, of the various types of debt issued by all state and local government agencies in California.
resource.attribution: California State Treasurer's Office - California Debt and Investment Advisory Commission
columns_name: Issue Costs Pct of Principal Amt
columns_description: Issuance Documents
Links to ADT report or PDF document if no report exists
Identifies green bonds, social impact bonds and sustainability bonds.
Debt Policy
Indicates if Issue will submit ADTR next year
Indicates if ADTR is required for the Issue
Last time ADTR was submitted for Issue
